title: cmd/go, cmd/gc: reject import paths containing special characters
body:
Discussion during CL 5674043.

Plan is to reject control characters (including \x00 and \x7F), spaces,
invalid UTF-8 encodings, and !"#$%&'()*,:;<=>?[\]^`{|}~

Need to put rules in compiler, go/parser, and spec (implementation restriction).
